name: Dual Sync
description:
Run fast and kill as you will

Dual Sync is a game made by students where you go quick and kill dudes.

Your goal is to reach the end of the level and get the higher score possible, which you can achieve going as fast as you can while slaughtering anyone who crosses your path using all the tools at your disposal. 

Weapons:

  • Revolver - The basic weapon. It has the shortest reload time.
  • Sniper - Shoots projectiles that bounce off enemies if they are close to each other.
  • Shotgun - Shoots multiple bullets and lets you propel yourself using the knockback if you shoot it near any surface.

Grenades:

  • Fragmentation - It explodes. Nothing new.
  • Flash - Blinds the enemies and incapacitates them.
  • Lure - Attracts everything nearby.

Skills:

  • Slowmo - Makes time pass veery slowly for a few seconds.
  • Shield - Surrounds you with a weird energy that protects you from attacks.
  • Parry - Time it right and you'll return enemies' bullets back to them.

Mad Studio's staff:

  • Victor Zaragoza Porto
  • Francesc Flórez Martínez
  • Carlos Serrano Serrano
